item.title: Collection of Free online Materials
item.description: Collection of online links that I find usefull and I need to remember Caveat : Limited to my interest and frequent reads Disclaimer: Not promotional or marketing of any sorts R Online Books R for Data Science Happy Git with R Advanced R Mastering Shiny though still under review Blog using R once you start road of down, I would advice starting with the RMarkdown which will take you down the rabbit hole to Bookdown Python Online Books Python Data Science Handbook Command line Online Books Data Science at the Command Line Other content/Interesting blog online Learn R and Python in Parallel Another Book on Data Science though still under review
